author: Special Correspondent
text:
Former Union Minister M.K. Alagiri said no one could prevent him from expressing his opinion on the DMK because he had served the party better than anyone else. In a Facebook post Mr. Alagiri said he had gone to jail many times and if he had committed anything wrong it would be for the sake of the party. “I have served the party with great commitment and I have the right to express my concern ,” he said.

RELATED NEWS Alagiri meets father Karunanidhi ‘with no agenda’
title: I have every right to criticise DMK, says Alagiri
